name: Deus In Machina
description:
Set in a mesmerizing vaporwave-themed environment, this game will challenge you to become the ultimate deity of the machine, as you navigate through levels that are procedurally generated to keep you on your toes.

This game was made over the course of 7 days for Dungeon Crawler Jam 2023, with the bulk of the work being done over sleepless nights in the last three days. It's far from perfect, but we learned a lot making it.

Credits:
NekOz - 3D Assets / Textures
MemeMan - Programming / SFX
Trish<3 - Composer
Kimusabe - Composer / 3D Models

Asset Credits:
Kolen (Sketchfab) - Helios statue 
Tedium Interactive (OpenGameArt) - Melee Weapons
pistachio (OpenGameArt) - Human Basemeshes
yughues (OpenGameArt) - Free Pillars models
